strapiPost.title: So Much To Learn
strapiPost.content:
Hobbs State Park-Conservation Area released its October events calendar with fun planned for the entire family.

  • Immerse yourself: You can learn about topics such as the local bug life or float fishing from guest speakers. You can study the stars with the Sugar Creek Astronomy Association or join a photo walk with the Photographic Society of NWA. 
  • Go play: Arkansas's largest state park located on the southern shore of Beaver Lake has over 54 miles of trail, with multiple camping sites, and is the only park in Arkansas to allow regulated hunting.

Check out all the fun at Arkansas's largest state park HERE.
